title: Episode #1.1
episode_desc: In 1977, frustrated FBI hostage negotiator Holden Ford finds an unlikely ally in veteran agent Bill Tench and begins studying a new class of murderer.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #1.2
episode_desc: Holden interviews the eerily articulate murderer Ed Kemper, but his research provokes negative feedback at the Bureau.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #1.3
episode_desc: Dr Wendy Carr joins Holden and Tench in their first success, when their insights lead to an arrest.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #1.4
episode_desc: Bill and Holden consult with Dr Wendy Carr to begin classifying their subjects and they receive surprising news.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #1.5
episode_desc: Holden and Bill return to a perplexing case in Pennsylvania where a set of clues leading in multiple directions leaves no shortage of suspects.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #1.6
episode_desc: Wendy considers an offer. Holden and Bill struggle to communicate their findings to the judicial system in the baffling Altoona case.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #1.7
episode_desc: Wendy takes a career risk to relocate and join the team full time. Holden and Bill find it harder to keep the emotional intensity of work at bay.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #1.8
episode_desc: Bill and Wendy interview candidates for a fourth member of the team. Holden is intrigued by complaints about a school principal's odd habit.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #1.9
episode_desc: Holden's methods during a disturbing interview with mass murderer Richard Speck create dissension among the team and kick off an internal FBI probe.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #1.10
episode_desc: The team cracks under the pressure from an in-house review. Holden's bold style elicits a confession but puts his career, relationships and health at risk.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #2.1
episode_desc: Amid sweeping changes at the BSU, Holden deals with severe repercussions from his close encounter with Ed Kemper.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #2.2
episode_desc: To glean insight into the elusive BTK killer, Bill and Holden interview Son of Sam, who makes a startling admission.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #2.3
episode_desc: Bill gets drawn into a horrifying crime that hits close to home. Holden receives an intriguing offer while in Atlanta to interview a pair of killers.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #2.4
episode_desc: Holden develops a controversial profile in the Atlanta slayings. Wendy conducts her first interview and finds being on the front lines suits her well.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #2.5
episode_desc: Bill's devastating family situation spills over during his interview with Holden's holy-grail subject: Charlie Manson. Wendy's new romance heats up.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #2.6
episode_desc: The FBI officially sends the BSU to Atlanta to investigate the missing and murdered children. Wendy second-guesses her interview methods.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #2.7
episode_desc: Hitting a dead end, Holden suggests a bold plan to draw the killer out. Bill's family faces more scrutiny. Wendy chafes as her job begins to shift.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #2.8
episode_desc: Red tape hinders Holden's plan to narrow his suspect pool. A weary and heartsick Bill tries to connect with his son. Wendy rethinks her relationship.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.

title: Episode #2.9
episode_desc: The investigation zeroes in on a prime suspect who proves adept at manipulating a volatile situation to his advantage.
show_desc: Set in the late 1970s, two FBI agents are tasked with interviewing serial killers to solve open cases.
